title: Master Hunter K - Novel Updates

tags: Archery   Artifacts   Betrayal   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Dragons   Elemental Magic   Friendship   Game Elements   Grinding   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Merchants   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Previous Life Talent   Romantic Subplot   Second Chance   Sentient Objects   Skill Books   Strong to Stronger   Summoning Magic   Survival Game   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Weak to Strong

description:
“With your own strength, prove the worth of your species.”

Without warning, every man, woman, and child was teleported off to fight an endless series of battles. Failure to clear every objective means that humanity shall be purged, or so the Operator claims.

But if that is true, why was K sent back in time?>
